CustomField.description: Base monthly rental amount before additional charges. Does not include operating expenses, taxes, or insurance that may be tenant's responsibility based on lease structure. If the rent changes over the term of the lease, this field represents the initial, monthly base rent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Base monthly rental amount before additional charges. Does not include operating expenses, taxes, or insurance that may be tenant's responsibility based on lease structure. If the rent changes over the term of the lease, this field represents the initial, monthly base rent.
CustomField.label: Monthly Base Rent
